data.title: Exciting sports festival to celebrate Vietnam's major holidays in Cambodia
data.meta_description: Towards celebrating the 49th anniversary of the Liberation of the South and reunification of the country (April 30, 4-April 1975, 30), 4th anniversary of the Victory of Dien Bien Phu (May 2024, 70-May 7). /5) and 1954 years of International Labor Day (May 7, 5 - May 2024, 138), the Vietnamese Embassy in the Kingdom of Cambodia organized a welcome sports festival with many activities.
data.meta_site_name: Vietnam.vn - Nền tảng quảng bá về Việt Nam
data.text:
Towards celebrating the 49th anniversary of the Liberation of the South and reunification of the country (April 30, 4-April 1975, 30), 4th anniversary of the Victory of Dien Bien Phu (May 2024, 70-May 7). /5) and 1954 years of International Labor Day (May 7, 5 - May 2024, 138), the Vietnamese Embassy in the Kingdom of Cambodia organized a welcome sports festival with many exciting sports activities, creating a playground for health training, as well as strengthening the connection of the Vietnamese community in Cambodia.

According to a reporter from the Vietnam News Agency in Phnom Penh, the sports festival to celebrate the major holidays of 2024 takes place in an exciting atmosphere from April 20-26 with 4 competitions: badminton, tennis, Chinese chess and golf. .

The sports festival attracted nearly 100 athletes from the Vietnamese Embassy in Cambodia, agencies next to the Embassy, ​​Bank for Investment and Development of Cambodia (BIDC), MED115 Hospital, Angkor Milk company, restaurants Ha Long Quan participated in the competition.

Speaking at the sports festival, Vietnamese Ambassador to the Kingdom of Cambodia Nguyen Huy Tang highlighted the great significance of important events, especially the nationwide event commemorating the 70th anniversary of the historic victory of Dien Bien Phu in 2024.

According to Ambassador Nguyen Huy Tang, the Dien Bien Phu Victory is an event of extremely important historical significance, opening a new phase for the Vietnamese Revolution, creating a premise for the country to continue winning the war. Resistance against America to save the country in 1975.

Ambassador Nguyen Huy Tang said that in order to join the excited atmosphere to welcome the country's major anniversaries, the Vietnamese Embassy organized a sports festival with agencies besides the Embassy, ​​businesses and organizations. surrounding areas to respond to the spirit of major holidays, while contributing to training and improving the health of staff and athletes.

More importantly, through sports exchange activities, staff and athletes have the opportunity to strengthen solidarity and help each other at work as well as in daily life. Thereby, giving athletes a spirit of excitement and enthusiasm to work more effectively.

After a week of exciting competition, at the closing ceremony of the sports festival taking place on the evening of April 26, the Organizing Committee awarded prizes and medals to outstanding individuals and groups who won prizes in each content. competition, to honor and encourage the spirit of movement sports athletes at the Vietnamese Embassy in the Kingdom of Cambodia.

For many years, sports exchange and competition activities for officials and employees of the Embassy, ​​neighboring agencies, businesses and the Vietnamese community in Cambodia have been regularly held on the occasion of the anniversary of these achievements. Great national holiday./.

(VNA/Vietnam+)

Nguon
